verbose_text: To this end, Igkappa DeltaDm mice were bred onto a Rag1 -/- background, effectively blocking rearrangement of the Igkappa locus and differentiation to the mature B cell stage.
evidence: Igkappa DeltaDm  mice were bred onto a Rag1 -/-  background, effectively blocking rearrangement of the Igkappa locus and differentiation
